name: perfect copy
description:
This game was made for the Trijam #206 in 3 hours, 26 minutes and 50 seconds

A score of 10 is a perfect copy

personal best : 9.7

Made with p5.js, p5.collide.js and p5.scribble.js - sounds from lasonotheque.org

Also, here is a boring video of me making the game at x60 speed
